/usr/bin/c++   -Wall -Werror -pedantic -g -std=c++11 -g    CMakeFiles/Viewer3d.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Viewer3d.dir/src/Shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Viewer3d.dir/src/Mesh.cpp.o  -o ../bin/Viewer3d -rdynamic -lGL -lX11 -lXext -lm /usr/local/build/SFML-2.3/lib/libsfml-system.so /usr/local/build/SFML-2.3/lib/libsfml-window.so /usr/local/build/SFML-2.3/lib/libsfml-graphics.so /usr/local/build/SFML-2.3/lib/libsfml-network.so /usr/local/build/SFML-2.3/lib/libsfml-audio.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/build/SFML-2.3/lib
